list-item.p:
the probability of “both the interclass HFRS incidences occur at
p and
p ′” is very low (with probability 0.132),

the probability of “either the HFRS incidence occurs at
p ′ or it does not occur at
p ” is very high (0.878),
the probability of “either both HFRS incidences occur or both do not” is moderate (0.368); and

the probability of “the HFRS incidence occurs at
p ′ given that it occurs at
p ” is relatively high (0.517).
